503890.name: Turner - Soundtrack
503890.description:
Get the iconic soundtrack for the video game "Turner" by Bean Boy Games. This 20 track soundtrack includes high quality versions of the songs heard in Turner, plus four bonus tracks.

Track List:
  • Asylum - 4:46
  • Seething - 1:25
  • Assembly Line - 4:44
  • Boxed In - 5:07
  • Short Circuit - 4:39
  • The Night Sky - 1:12
  • The Longest Mile - 2:58
  • Ghostly - 4:47
  • The Birds are Calling - 3:42
  • Falling - 4:30
  • In the Streets - 4:52
  • It's Different - 3:16
  • Her Eyes on Mine - 0:37
  • Ascend - 1:03
  • Boiling Over - 5:08
  • Dark Corridors - 4:31
  • (Bonus) Head of Stalin - 4:38
  • (Bonus) The Longest Mile - In Game Version - 3:07
  • (Bonus) The Night Sky - Full Version - 2:40
  • (Bonus) Instability - 4:56

Created by Kevin Thomas.

This soundtrack doesn't include the main menu song written by Dane Coburn.
503890.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
